main.name: Afrokoder (Kay.U)
main.bio: Hi there! I am Kelechi U! You might also know me as Afrokoder. Nigerian-American residing in the Midwest USA. I've been in tech for over 5 years now and software development the past two. As a Full Stack developer & Data Scientist I also work across the board (startups to large corporations) with those looking to utilize their data to make better business decisions and improve their products and services. As Ive progressed through my tech journey I’ve realized an increase in my passion to help others find their place in tech, skill up into those roles and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. So please reach out to me and let’s get a conversation started, a partnership or a business deal going. Looking forward to meeting you!
main.contactmessage: Interested in working with Me? send me some basic information & lets get in touch!

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science, Information & Telecomms Technology

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I Build Solutions that help Retailers and Suppliers in their ecosystem have better visibility and control at every point in their supply chain!

work.title: Founder/CTO
work.description: Curating A support community for Devs of Color & African Heritage.

testimonials.text: Kelechi is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really means a lot to me... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Kelechi has been AWESOME, he makes learning to code so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
Its been great watching Kelechi go from finding his passion to helping others do the same, so proud of you!
